basic.description: This course is built around a systematic reading of Foucault's provocative historical and philosophical reflections on the "all-too human" history of the human and social sciences. Readings include recently-published lectures from Michael Foucault's tenure at the College de France, as well as texts that have become classics, such as Order of Things and Discipline and Punish.
basic.subject: HPS
basic.title: Power, Knowledge and Control: Foucault and the History of the Human        Sciences
